display_html: type Mock c = (Crypto c, Signable (KES c) ~ SignableRepresentation, Signable (DSIGN c) ~ SignableRepresentation, Signable (VRF c) Seed)
name: Mock

display_html: type ExMock c = (Mock c, Num (SignKeyDSIGN (DSIGN c)), Num (VerKeyDSIGN (DSIGN c)), VRF c ~ FakeVRF)
name: ExMock

display_html:
data Constants = Constants {
  • minNumGenInputs ∷ Int
  • maxNumGenInputs ∷ Int
  • frequencyRegKeyCert ∷ Int
  • frequencyRegPoolCert ∷ Int
  • frequencyDelegationCert ∷ Int
  • frequencyGenesisDelegationCert ∷ Int
  • frequencyDeRegKeyCert ∷ Int
  • frequencyRetirePoolCert ∷ Int
  • frequencyMIRCert ∷ Int
  • frequencyScriptCredReg ∷ Int
  • frequencyKeyCredReg ∷ Int
  • frequencyScriptCredDeReg ∷ Int
  • frequencyKeyCredDeReg ∷ Int
  • frequencyScriptCredDelegation ∷ Int
  • frequencyKeyCredDelegation ∷ Int
  • frequencyTxUpdates ∷ Int
  • frequencyTxWithMetaData ∷ Int
  • minGenesisUTxOouts ∷ Int
  • maxGenesisUTxOouts ∷ Int
  • maxCertsPerTx ∷ Word64
  • maxTxsPerBlock ∷ Word64
  • maxNumKeyPairs ∷ Word64
  • minGenesisOutputVal ∷ Integer
  • maxGenesisOutputVal ∷ Integer
  • numBaseScripts ∷ Int
  • frequencyNoWithdrawals ∷ Int
  • frequencyAFewWithdrawals ∷ Int
  • maxAFewWithdrawals ∷ Int
  • frequencyPotentiallyManyWithdrawals ∷ Int
  • minSlotTrace ∷ Int
  • maxSlotTrace ∷ Int
  • frequencyLowMaxEpoch ∷ Word64
  • maxMinFeeA ∷ Natural
  • maxMinFeeB ∷ Natural
  • numCoreNodes ∷ Word64
  • minTreasury ∷ Integer
  • maxTreasury ∷ Integer
  • minReserves ∷ Integer
  • maxReserves ∷ Integer
  • genTxRetries ∷ Int
}
name: Constants Constants minNumGenInputs maxNumGenInputs frequencyRegKeyCert frequencyRegPoolCert frequencyDelegationCert frequencyGenesisDelegationCert frequencyDeRegKeyCert frequencyRetirePoolCert frequencyMIRCert frequencyScriptCredReg frequencyKeyCredReg frequencyScriptCredDeReg frequencyKeyCredDeReg frequencyScriptCredDelegation frequencyKeyCredDelegation frequencyTxUpdates frequencyTxWithMetaData minGenesisUTxOouts maxGenesisUTxOouts maxCertsPerTx maxTxsPerBlock maxNumKeyPairs minGenesisOutputVal maxGenesisOutputVal numBaseScripts frequencyNoWithdrawals frequencyAFewWithdrawals maxAFewWithdrawals frequencyPotentiallyManyWithdrawals minSlotTrace maxSlotTrace frequencyLowMaxEpoch maxMinFeeA maxMinFeeB numCoreNodes minTreasury maxTreasury minReserves maxReserves genTxRetries

data AllIssuerKeys v (r ∷ KeyRole) = AllIssuerKeys {
  • cold ∷ KeyPair r v
  • vrf ∷ (SignKeyVRF v, VerKeyVRF v)
  • hot ∷ [(KESPeriod, (SignKeyKES v, VerKeyKES v))]
  • hk ∷ KeyHash r v
}
name: AllIssuerKeys AllIssuerKeys cold hk vrf hot

display_html:
data KeySpace era = KeySpace_ {
  • ksCoreNodes ∷ [(GenesisKeyPair era, AllIssuerKeys era GenesisDelegate)]
  • ksGenesisDelegates ∷ [AllIssuerKeys era GenesisDelegate]
  • ksStakePools ∷ [AllIssuerKeys era StakePool]
  • ksKeyPairs ∷ KeyPairs era
  • ksMSigScripts ∷ MultiSigPairs era
  • ksIndexedPaymentKeys ∷ Map (KeyHash Payment era) (KeyPair Payment era)
  • ksIndexedStakingKeys ∷ Map (KeyHash Staking era) (KeyPair Staking era)
  • ksIndexedGenDelegates ∷ Map (KeyHash GenesisDelegate era) (AllIssuerKeys era GenesisDelegate)
  • ksIndexedPayScripts ∷ Map (ScriptHash era) (MultiSig era, MultiSig era)
  • ksIndexedStakeScripts ∷ Map (ScriptHash era) (MultiSig era, MultiSig era)
}
name: KeySpace KeySpace_ ksCoreNodes ksGenesisDelegates ksStakePools ksKeyPairs ksMSigScripts ksIndexedPaymentKeys ksIndexedStakingKeys ksIndexedGenDelegates ksIndexedPayScripts ksIndexedStakeScripts
